response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit your business. Given its value and the impact it could have on your operations, I propose a price of $14,000 for the product. This price not only ensures a fair return for us but also offers you a significant saving compared to its market value of $15,000. I look forward to hearing your decision.", "product_price": 14000}
